Python Module Index

a | c | e | g | i | l | r | s
 
a
animationSystem (Unix, Windows) Computes which frame of animation should be displayed.
 
c
chaosparticle (Unix, Windows) Two dimensional particle system.
collisionSystem (Unix, Windows) Collision system.
combatsystem (Unix, Windows) Handles collision between characters and projectiles etc.
components (Unix, Windows) All game component used.
controller (Unix, Windows) Generates events according input of various controllers connected to the game.
 
e
events (Unix, Windows) A module that contains an event manager and all types of events, that can occur in game.
 
g
game (Unix, Windows) The main game module contains CPUSpiner to control CPU-ticks and the main game loop.
gameWorld (Unix, Windows) Container of all entities in game.
 
i
inputSystem (Unix, Windows) Translates events from controllers to actions.
 
l
level (Unix, Windows) Simple level class which loads level data from a TMX file.
 
r
renderSystem (Unix, Windows) Render system
 
s
systemManager (Unix, Windows) system manager contains all game systems.
